Note: For similar lines see 6481; for another poem on this theme see 3342. Cf. also 6684.

BLCottCalAIX.First Lines: Hƿenne so wil ƿit ofer steðþenne is wil and wit for lore…
BLCottCalAIX.Last Lines: …Ac hƿenne so wil to wene ƿrieðþe ofo of wisdom is to tore
